chapters.title: Chapter 14: What a Veil Hides
chapters.info: Mylen, p. 324 (368)—One of six damane in direct service to Tuon. She is very short, shorter than Tuon. She is a special source of pride as Tuon trained her herself. She was an Aes Sedai before being captured, but has been so changed by her captivity that she would betray a liberator. See also Caminelle, Sheraine; Catrona.
